title: Cartman Gets an Anal Probe
description: While the boys are waiting for the school bus, Cartman explains the odd nightmare he had about alien visitors abducting him.

title: Weight Gain 4000
description: When Cartman's environmental essay wins a national contest, America's sweetheart Kathie Lee Gifford comes to South Park to present the award.

title: Volcano
description: A weekend trip to experience camping, fishing and blowing animals to smithereens is threatened by an erupting volcano and a mysterious creature.

title: Big Gay Al's Big Gay Boat Ride
description: When Stan discovers his new dog Sparky is gay, he becomes so confused he loses his will to play in the Homecoming football game against Middle Park.

title: An Elephant Makes Love to a Pig
description: Kyle isn't allowed to keep his new pet elephant because it's too big. The boys find Dr. Mephesto to try and genetically engineer a smaller elephant.

title: Death
description: Grandpa's sole birthday wish is for Stan to take part in his assisted suicide. Mrs. Broflovski has organized a protest against the boys' favorite TV show Terrance and Phillip.

title: Pinkeye
description: A mishap at the morgue transforms the residents of South Park into brain-eating zombies and threatens the boys' night of trick-or-treating.

title: Damien
description: Shunned by the other kids, the Son of Satan calls upon his father to fight Jesus in the ultimate pay-per-view boxing match between good and evil.

title: Starvin' Marvin
description: The boys are accidentally mailed an African child. Mistaking Cartman for the child, government authorities send him to Ethiopia where he runs into Sally Struthers.

title: Mr. Hankey, the Christmas Poo
description: While South Park Elementary attempts to stage the most non-offensive, non-denominational holiday play, Kyle tries to make people believe in Mr. Hankey.

title: Tom's Rhinoplasty
description: Mr. Garrison deserts the class for a visit to Tom's Rhinoplasty. All the boys compete for the attention of their beautiful substitute teacher Ms. Ellen.

title: Mecha-Streisand
description: The boys' discovery of a prehistoric relic allows Barbara Streisand to transform into a monster that threatens to destroy South Park and the world.

title: Cartman's Mom Is a Dirty Slut
description: Who is Eric Cartman's father? It could be anyone who attended South Park's 12th Annual Drunken Barn Dance.

title: Terrance and Phillip in Not Without My Anus
description: In a Terrance and Phillip special, the Canadian duo must save Terrance's daughter Sally and all of Canada from the evil dictator Saddam Hussein.

title: Cartman's Mom Is Still a Dirty Slut
description: The boys wait for Dr. Mephesto to regain consciousness and reveal the identity of Cartman's father. Meanwhile, an unexpected blizzard hits South Park.

title: Chickenlover
description: In order to catch the "Chickenlover", Officer Barbrady must learn how to read. Barbrady resigns and anarchy ensues, so the boys pitch in to help.

title: Ike's Wee Wee
description: When the boys find out what it means to be circumcised, they try to save Ike from his Bris. The school counselor Mr. Mackey is fired and experiments with drugs.

title: Conjoined Fetus Lady
description: South Park citizens declare a "Conjoined Twin Myslexia Awareness Week" to help the school nurse. The school's dodgeball team goes to the championships with Pip as their star player.

title: The Mexican Staring Frog of Southern Sri Lanka
description: Jimbo and Ned's efforts to drive up the ratings for their new hunting show threatens to edge out an old favorite, Jesus and Pals.

title: City on the Edge of Forever (Flashbacks)
description: A freak accident leaves the South Park Elementary school bus teetering precariously on the edge of a cliff. To cope, the boys reminisce the good old days.

title: Summer Sucks
description: The entire town is gearing up for the annual 4th of July celebration when a ban on fireworks is imposed. They attempt to create something better.

title: Chef's Chocolate Salty Balls
description: South Park's first film festival attracts crowds of tofu-eating movie lovers to the quiet town, badly affecting Mr. Hankey. Chef makes some money by selling his chocolate salty balls.

title: Chickenpox
description: The parents only have their children's best interests at heart when they arrange for Stan, Kyle and Cartman to be exposed to Kenny's chickenpox virus.

title: Roger Ebert Should Lay Off the Fatty Foods
description: Is the new planetarium a boring place to learn about the solar system, or the scene of a diabolical plot to control the minds of South Park's citizens?

title: Clubhouses
description: Stan and Kyle are psyched to have Wendy and Bebe visit their clubhouse for a game of Truth or Dare, but first they have to build one.

title: Cow Days
description: South Park's 14th Annual Cow Days rodeo and carnival is here, and the boys are determined to win Terrance and Phillip dolls. Meanwhile, the town's cows begin to worship a statue.

title: Chef Aid
description: After a huge loss in court, Chef is left penniless. The boys gather some very famous and talented people in the music industry who want to help their old friend.

title: Spookyfish
description: When Sharon Marsh's Aunt Flo makes a monthly visit, she brings a mysterious pet fish for Stan. Cartman suddenly has a beard and is very nice.

title: Merry Christmas Charlie Manson!
description: Dinner with Cartman's family takes a bizarre twist when Uncle Howard shows up after breaking out of prison with his cellmate Charlie Manson.

title: Gnomes
description: The boys are assigned to write a report with Tweek, a very nervous and highly caffeinated boy who insists gnomes are stealing his underpants.

title: Prehistoric Ice Man
description: Kyle and Stan's friendship is strained after they discover a man frozen in an ice cave and argue about what is best for their "discovery".

title: Rainforest Shmainforest
description: The boys travel to Costa Rica as part of the "Getting Gay with Kids" choir tour campaigning to save the rainforest. They subsequently get lost.

title: Spontaneous Combustion
description: When South Park citizens start randomly exploding, the mayor enlists the town's only geologist Randy Marsh to find the cause and solution. Stan, Kyle and Cartman reenact the Stations of the Cross.

title: The Succubus
description: When Chef gets engaged, the boys become concerned of his different personality and his evil fiancee. Cartman suffers from vision problems.

title: Tweek Vs. Craig
description: The boys try to instigate a fight between Tweek and Craig. Meanwhile, Mr. Adler the shop teacher is haunted by a recurring dream of his lost love.

title: Jakovasaurs
description: The boys discover a prehistoric creature called a Jakovasaur while camping at Stark's Pond. The town tries to save the species from extinction.

title: Sexual Harassment Panda
description: A giant panda mascot educates the children on sexual harassment. Cartman sues Stan for sexual harassment, which eventually leads to everyone in South Park suing each other.

title: Cat Orgy
description: While all the adults gather at Mr. Mackey's house to watch the meteor shower, Shelly Marsh babysits for Cartman and invites her much-older boyfriend over. Cartman's cat is in heat.

title: Two Guys Naked in a Hot Tub
description: Stan is dragged to Mr. Mackey's meteor shower party and sent down into the basement to play with Pip, Butters and Dougie. Randy and Gerald share an intimate moment in a hot tub.

title: Jewbilee
description: Kyle invites Kenny to join him and Ike at Jewbilee, a camp for Jewish kids, where they summon Moses. Meanwhile, an evil plot to release Haman is at hand.

title: Chinpokomon
description: The boys and their classmates are caught up in the latest fad from Japan called Chinpokomon that contains subliminal propaganda to bring down the American government.

title: Starvin' Marvin in Space
description: Starvin' Marvin returns to South Park with an alien spaceship and enlists Cartman, Stan, Kyle and Kenny's help to seek out a new home for his starving people.

title: Korn's Groovy Pirate Ghost Mystery
description: Korn comes to South Park for a Halloween concert and helps the boys solve a spooky pirate ghost mystery.

title: Hooked on Monkey Fonics
description: To help Cartman win the school spelling bee, Cartman's Mom gives him the Hooked on Monkey Fonics spelling system.

title: The Red Badge of Gayness
description: Cartman has visions of glory as he suits up for the Confederacy in the annual reenactment of a Civil War battle, and leads the drunken rebels to defeat the union.

title: Mr. Hankey's Christmas Classics
description: An extravaganza of holiday songs are performed in unique South Park style, hosted by Mr. Hankey.

title: Are You There, God? It's Me, Jesus
description: People from all over the world start to gather outside Jesus' house waiting for a millennium miracle.

title: World Wide Recorder Concert
description: The children of South Park are invited to Arkansas for the "Four Million Child Blow 2000," the first worldwide recorder concert.

title: Cartman's Silly Hate Crime 2000
description: Cartman is pursued by the FBI for committing a hate crime and lands in juvenile hall.

title: The Tooth Fairy's Tats 2000
description: When Cartman discovers the Tooth Fairy is paying a premium price for his lost teeth, he and the boys seize the opportunity to make some cash.

title: Quintuplets 2000
description: 8-year-old contorting quintuplets from Romania defect to the United States and seek shelter with Stan's family.

title: Timmy 2000
description: When Timmy is diagnosed with Attention Deficit Disorder, it triggers a wave of prescription drug abuse at South Park Elementary.

title: Pip
description: When Pip is offered the opportunity to become a gentleman he goes to London only to discover that Miss Havisham plans to break his heart.

title: Cartman Joins NAMBLA
description: Cartman decides to seek friendship using the Internet, and finds an older man who is more than willing to be his friend...and more.

title: Cherokee Hair Tampons
description: Kyle needs a kidney transplant and Cartman is a discovered to be the perfect donor. Cartman gladly offers his kidney to Kyle -- for the price of $10 million dollars.

title: Chef Goes Nanners
description: Chef's passionate protest declaring the South Park flag racist enflames the entire town.

title: Something You Can Do With Your Finger
description: "Fingerbang" is the newest boy band starring all the boys and it's also Cartman's latest scheme to make a million dollars.

title: Do the Handicapped Go to Hell?
description: The boys learn in Sunday school that they must confess their sins, but worry about Timmy since all he can say is his own name.

title: Probably
description: Cartman's flock begins to grow and the children begin plans to build him a Church. Meanwhile, Satan turns to God for advice.

title: Fourth Grade
description: The boys devise a plan to travel back in time a full year and return to the third grade, with the help of Timmy and his electronic wheelchair.

title: Trapper Keeper
description: When he finally stops bragging about his new Trapper Keeper, a stranger informs him that it will eventually take over the world and destroy humankind, if they don't destroy it first.

title: Helen Keller! The Musical
description: When Butters informs the forth grader's that the Kindergarteners school play is a magnificent sight to behold, they go through a lot of pain to make sure they beat the tiny tots' show.

title: Fat Camp
description: Cartman's family and friends have intervened and are forcing him to trim down. While Cartman's away, Kenny's star is on the rise when he gets his own reality TV show.

title: The Wacky Molestation Adventure
description: To get back at his parents for not letting him go to a concert, Kyle tells the police that his parents molested him. Soon, the whole town is free of adults and divided into two rival cities

title: A Very Crappy Christmas
description: When Mr. Hankey skips Christmas, the boys find him living with his alcoholic wife and their three little nuggets. He tells them that no one is into Christmas anymore

title: It Hits the Fan
description: The you-know-what hits the fan 162 times when the citizens of South Park tune in to hear the word "shit" on a popular TV shows.

title: Cripple Fight
description: Big Gay Al returns to South Park as the new scout leader. When he is fired for being gay, the boys rally to his defense with the help of the new "handi-capable" kid, Jimmy.

title: Super Best Friends
description: Teaming up with Jesus, Stan calls upon all the Super Best Friends to destroy the evil cult leader and magician David Blaine and thwart the mass suicide pact he has planned.

title: Scott Tenorman Must Die
description: After the other boys explain to Cartman that pubes don't count unless you grow your own, Cartman realizes he's been tricked by the school bully, Scott Tenorman.

title: Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow
description: When the boys discover Terrance and Philip have called it quits, they'll go to any lengths to reunite the duo and recruit them for South Park's Earth Day festivities.

title: Cartmanland
description: Cartman inherits a million dollars from his grandmother and fulfills his lifelong dream of owning his own amusement park: Cartmanland!

title: Proper Condom Use
description: In a time-honored tradition and right-of-passage, the boys are separated from the girls and schooled in the mysteries of sex by none other than Mr. Mackey.

title: Towelie
description: When the government steals their new Gamesphere, the boys will stop at nothing to get it back.

title: Osama bin Laden Has Farty Pants
description: The kids of South Park have raised money to send to children of Afghanistan, but the Government believes the Afghani children's thank you gift is contaminated with Anthrax and the boys are forced to take it back to Afghanistan.

title: How To Eat With Your Butt
description: Cartman gets Kenny's school picture on every "missing child" milk carton in the country.

title: The Entity
description: Mr. Garrison gets fed up with long lines, delayed flights and the airline industry in general and invents his own transportation device.

title: Here Comes the Neighborhood
description: Tolkien is tired of being the only rich kid in town, and succeeds in attracting several other wealthy families to South Park

title: Kenny Dies
description: In a very special episode of "South Park," Cartman fights for Kenny's life when he speaks before Congress in favor of stem-cell research.

title: Butters' Very Own Episode
description: Alone and lost, Butters determinedly makes his way through porn theatres and gay bath houses in an effort to get his dad back home in time to eat at Bennigan's for his parents' anniversary.

title: Freak Strike
description: When the boys learn that talk shows offer prizes to people who are grossly disfigured they can't sign Butters up fast enough.

title: Jared Has Aides
description: As the country becomes obsessed with a popular program for losing weight, the boys see an opportunity to become sponsored by a major restaurant chain.

title: Asspen
description: While the adults are trapped at a time-share sales meeting, Stan is challenged by the best skier on the mountain.

title: The New Terrance and Phillip Movie Trailer
description: All the kids in South Park are glued to the TV, wild with anticipation to see the first trailer for the latest Terrance and Phillip movie.

title: Fun with Veal
description: Stan is appalled when he realizes the veal he's been eating is, in fact, the meat from little baby calves.

title: Professor Chaos
description: The boys fire Butters as their new friend. Devastation over his rejection unleashes Butters' dark side and Professor Chaos is born.

title: The Simpsons Already Did It
description: Professor Chaos is frustrated when he realizes all of his diabolical plans to wreak havoc on South Park have already been done by "The Simpsons".

title: Red Hot Catholic Love
description: A sexual abuse scandal involving priests hits South Park and is taken all the way to the Vatican.

title: Free Hat
description: When the boys find out that their favorite movies are being enhanced, re-released and ruined in the process, they form a club to "Save Films from their Directors".

title: Bebe's Boobs Destroy Society
description: Bebe is the first girl in the fourth grade to "develop". Her new little breasts inspire a primate-like reaction from all the boys in class that threaten their friendship and society in general.

title: Child Abduction is Not Funny
description: In an effort to protect their children from kidnappers, the parents hire the owner of City Wok Restaurant to build the Great Wall of South Park.

title: A Ladder to Heaven
description: Kenny died with the winning ticket to a prize of endless candy in his pocket. The boys decide to build a ladder to Heaven where they expect to find him and get the ticket back.

title: The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers
description: The boys embark upon a mythical quest as they set out to return their copy of the "The Lord of the Rings" movie to their local video store.

title: The Death Camp of Tolerance
description: The boys are sentenced to the Death Camp of Tolerance where they learn how to treat minorities. Mr. Slave and Lemmiwinks make their debut in this episode.

title: The Biggest Douche in the Universe
description: When a famous psychic fails to help him exorcise Kenny from his body, Cartman and Chef travel to the moors of Scotland, where Chef's mom tries a little of her voodoo magic on him.

title: My Future Self 'n' Me
description: When a 32-year-old man claiming to be Stan from the future shows up in South Park, young Stan is forced to come to terms with the loser he will become.

title: Red Sleigh Down
description: Cartman has to score one big "nice" to be eligible for Christmas presents this year. He recruits Santa, Mr. Hankey and Jesus in a desperate attempt to bring Christmas to the downtrodden citizens of Iraq.

title: I'm a Little Bit Country
description: The boys join some anti-war protesters because it's a free pass out of school for the day.

title: Krazy Kripples
description: Jimmy and Timmy pull together a group of people like themselves and call their new club the "Crips".

title: Toilet Paper
description: Cartman convinces the boys to "toilet paper" their teacher's house, but Kyle is overwhelmed with guilt.

title: Cancelled
description: Stan, Cartman, Kyle and Kenny find out that planet Earth is just one big intergalactic reality show and it's about to be cancelled.

title: Fat Butt and Pancake Head
description: One of Cartman's body parts becomes famous overnight and rivals the popularity of another superstar.

title: Lil' Crime Stoppers
description: After they return a missing doll to a little girl, the police department recognizes the boys' efforts and officially names them, "junior deputies."

title: Red Man's Greed
description: The citizens of South Park are being forced off their land to make way for a new super highway after owners of the Three Feathers Indian Casino acquire the town.

title: South Park Is Gay
description: The town of South Park celebrates the new, hip metro-sexual craze.

title: Christian Rock Hard
description: When the other boys kick Cartman out of their band, he pulls his own group together to make music for Jesus.

title: Grey Dawn
description: With South Park's senior citizens behind the wheel, more than a few farmer's markets have been mowed down. Unwilling to surrender their driver's licenses, the elderly fight back.

title: Casa Bonita
description: Kyle chooses Stan, Kenny and Butters to celebrate his birthday at Casa Bonita. When Cartman finds out he's not invited, he arranges for Butters to conveniently go "missing".

title: All About Mormons
description: A Mormon kid moves to South Park and it's up to Stan to kick his ass. But when Stan and his dad meet their new Mormon neighbors, they become fascinated with how genuinely nice they are.

title: Butt Out
description: After singing and dancing representatives from an anti-smoking campaign rap about the dangers of smoking, the kids at South Park Elementary realize how cool it really is and take up the habit.

title: Raisins
description: After Wendy breaks up with Stan the boys take him to "Raisins", a local restaurant known for its great chicken wings and hot girls.

title: It's Christmas in Canada
description: The town decides to cancel Christmas and take up a collection when Ike's Canadian birth parents show up unexpectedly and want their baby back.

title: Good Times With Weapons
description: The boys are transformed into Japanese Warriors after they trick a vendor and buy martial arts weapons at a local flea market.

title: AWESOM-O
description: Cartman plans to learn all of Butters' innermost secrets and then use them against him, by pretending to be Butters' new best friend, a robot named AWESOM-O.

title: Up the Down Steroid
description: Jimmy is in training for the upcoming Special Olympics and he's determined to win at any cost

title: The Passion of the Jew
description: Kyle finally sees the blockbuster movie "The Passion of the Christ" and admits that Cartman has been right about the Jewish people all along.

title: You Got F'd in the A
description: Stan just got served, and now it's up to him to put together a team of South Park's best dancers to compete against a troupe from Orange County.

title: Goobacks
description: Humans from the year 3045 are traveling to South Park through a recently opened time portal and are looking for work.

title: The Jeffersons
description: The children of South Park are attracted to "Mr. Jefferson" the new neighbor in town, and Cartman goes out of his way to get "Mr. Jefferson" to love him best.

title: Douche and Turd
description: A PET protest against the use of a cow as South Park Elementary's mascot forces the student body to choose a new one.

title: Something Wall Mart This Way Comes
description: In order to save South Park, Stan and Kyle have to find a way to destroy the ever-expanding Wall Mart superstore while keeping Cartman from stabbing them in the back.

title: Pre-School
description: The kid who took the fall for the boys five years ago is getting out of Juvie, and his first order of business is revenge

title: Quest for Ratings
description: The boys of South Park produce their own morning news show on the school's closed-circuit television station and are immediately caught up in an intense competition for ratings.

title: Stupid Spoiled Whore Video Playset
description: Disturbed by the corruptive influence Paris Hilton has on all little girls in South Park, one of the town's favorite citizens challenges her to a "whore-off."

title: Cartman's Incredible Gift
description: After sustaining a severe head injury, Cartman appears to have the power to see into the future. South Park detectives are quick to enlist his help in cracking unsolved murder cases.

title: Woodland Critter Christmas
description: Stan agrees to help a group of adorable woodland critters build a manger in anticipation of the birth of their Lord and Savior, only to find out that they serve Satan.

title: Mr. Garrison's Fancy New Vagina
description: As Mr. garrison enjoys his new womanly attributes after his sex change, the rest of the town gets in touch with their inner feelings too.

title: Die Hippie, Die
description: When hippie drum circles start popping up in people's attics and backyards the citizens of South Park have no choice but to turn to Eric Cartman for help.

title: Wing
description: The boys set up a talent agency and pool all their resources and impress their first client only to have another agency steal him away.

title: Best Friends Forever
description: When Kenny meets with an unfortunate accident, Cartman lobbies to let Kenny die so he can can get what Kenny left to him in Kenny's will.

title: The Losing Edge
description: The kids desperately want an end to the boring baseball season. The problem is, they keep winning.

title: The Death of Eric Cartman
description: Cartman is sure he's dead and Butters is sure that Eric Cartman's ghost is haunting him. Together they attempt to make amends to all the people Cartman has wronged over the years.

title: Erection Day
description: The South Park Elementary School Talent Show is coming up and Jimmy can't wait to perform his comedy routine, but first he must find a way to gain control of his raging hormones.

title: Two Days Before the Day After Tomorrow
description: A Global Warming State is Emergency is declared in South Park as the world's largest beaver dam breaks and floods the adjacent town of Beaverton.

title: Marjorine
description: Butters must fake his death, dress up as a girl and infiltrate a slumber party, in order to retrieve a future telling device Cartman is convinced the girls have.

title: Follow That Egg
description: In an effort to thwart her ex-lovers plans to get married, Mrs. Garrison leads the charge against gay marriage.

title: Ginger Kids
description: After the sudden on-set of the disease Gingervitis, Cartman rallies all other ginger kids to rise up and assume their role as the master race.

title: Trapped in the Closet
description: Scientologists converge on Stan's house after he is identified as the reincarnation of L. Ron Hubbard. One A-lister locks himself in the closet and refuses to come out, after Stan criticizes his "talent."

title: Free Willzyx
description: The boys try to rescue their new friend Willzyx, a talking space whale, from the Denver Sea Park and with the help of MASA (Mexican Aeronautica y Spacia Administracion) get him home to the moon for $200.

title: Bloody Mary
description: Stan is embarrassed when his dad gets pulled over for drunk driving. Randy believes that only one thing can save him from his "disease," a bleeding statue of the Virgin Mary in the next town.

title: The Return of Chef
description: Chef returns to South Park after spending time away with a group called, "The Super Adventure Club", but when his strange behavior starts getting him in trouble, the boys risk everything to save him.

title: Smug Alert
description: Kyle and his family are moving to San Francisco. The only way Stan can get his best friend back is to convince everyone to start driving hybrid cars.

title: Cartoon Wars Part I
description: When the creators of the Family Guy announce that they will show the image of a religious symbol, the network threatens to ban the episode. Cartman sees this as his chance to get "Family Guy" off the air for good.

title: Cartoon Wars Part II
description: After leaving Kyle injured on the side of the road, Cartman races to the headquarters of "Family Guy" determined to put an end to the show once and for all.

title: A Million Little Fibers
description: Towelie gets over his drug addition and writes his memoirs. With Oprah's support, his book becomes a best seller and his story inspires millions to turn their lives around.

title: ManBearPig
description: Al Gore warns the school about the threat of ManBearPig.

title: Tsst!
description: When Cartman's mom realizes she can't control her son anymore, she gets help from an expert. The "Dog Whisperer" may have what it takes but Eric Cartman's not going down without a fight.

title: Make Love, Not Warcraft
description: There's trouble in the online gaming world when a mad gamer won't play by the rules. The boys dedicate their lives to defeating the renegade and saving the World of Warcraft.

title: Mystery of the Urinal Deuce
description: The world's biggest conspiracy of all time is finally uncovered when Eric Cartman exposes the true culprit behind the September 11th attacks.

title: Miss Teacher Bangs a Boy
description: In his new role as School Hallway Monitor at South Park Elementary, Cartman must team up with Kyle when they discover a teacher having sex with a student.

title: Hell on Earth 2006
description: Satan is throwing the biggest Halloween costume party ever. Just like a girl getting ready for her sweet sixteen, every detail must be perfect for the prince of darkness. The antics of the most notorious serial killers of all time threaten his fun.

title: Go God Go
description: South Park Elementary faces strong opposition to the topic of evolution. Cartman's too busy to notice as he plans to propel himself into the future on the precise release date of the newest, hottest game console.

title: Go God Go XII
description: Eric Cartman has frozen himself in an attempt to make his three-week wait for a Nintendo Wii pass quickly. A freak accident landed him over 500 years in the future and now, he's stuck in a Godless world on the brink of war with no Nintendo Wii.

title: Stanley's Cup
description: Stan Marsh has hit rock bottom. He's got no job, no bicycle and his only way out of a bad situation is to coach the local pee wee hockey team. But Marsh is still living with the memory of how he let his team down when he missed the winning shot in the big game.

title: With Apologies to Jesse Jackson
description: Randy Marsh tries to find forgiveness after mistakenly using a racial slur on "Wheel of Fortune". Meanwhile, Cartman fights a midget.

title: Cartman Sucks
description: Cartman invites Butters over for the night and plans to do disgusting things to him in his sleep. However, when he photographs Butters' penis in his mouth, there are drastic consequences for both boys.

title: Lice Capades
description: When Mrs. Garrison refuses to name names about an infestation of head lice that plagues South Park Elementary, Cartman finds a way to detect who has lice.

title: The Snuke
description: When a new Muslim student joins the class, Cartman immediately suspects him of being a terrorist.

title: Fantastic Easter Special
description: Stan starts asking his Dad some tough questions about the origins of Easter. The answers lead to an ancient and mysterious secret society created in the Middle Ages to protect the secret of the Easter Bunny.

title: D-Yikes!
description: When the bar Mrs. Garrison hangs out in is about to be taken over by Persian club owners, she fights to save the one place that lets her be the woman she is.

title: Night of the Living Homeless
description: Ignoring the homeless in South Park becomes impossible when their numbers become overwhelming and their lust for spare change becomes insatiable.

title: Le Petit Tourette
description: Faking Tourette's Syndrome and saying whatever he wants without getting in trouble, Cartman lines up an appearance with Chris Hansen on "Dateline NBC."

title: More Crap
description: Stan's dad Randy becomes South Park's hometown hero when the guys down at the local bar see the size of his most recent crap.

title: Imaginationland
description: When the entire contents of the world's imagination lay open before them, Stan and Kyle step right in. Back in South Park, Cartman swears he's seen a leprechaun.

title: Imaginationland, Episode II
description: After the wall in Imaginationland is blown up by terrorists, the evil side crosses over. Cartman tracks down Kyle and Stan at the Pentagon and demands Kyle makes good on their agreement. Meanwhile, U.S. troops cross over into Imaginationland while evil characters cross over into reality.

title: Imaginationland, Episode III
description: Inside Imaginationland, Stan and Butters engage in the battle of their lives as they fight the army of evil imaginary forces. Meanwhile, Cartman goes all the way to the Supreme Court to get Kyle to pay up on their bet.

title: Guitar Queer-O
description: When Stan and Kyle get hooked on Guitar Hero, Stan's superior skills put their friendship in danger.

title: The List
description: The girls in the fourth grade class have made a secret list that rates every boy's looks from cutest to ugliest. The boys steal the list, but are unprepared to deal with the results.

title: Tonsil Trouble
description: After a routine tonsillectomy goes horribly wrong, Cartman comes face to face with his own mortality.

title: Britney's New Look
description: When the boys help Britney Spears get to the North Pole, they discover the shocking secret behind her popularity.

title: Major Boobage
description: In a South Park homage to the 1981 film, "Heavy Metal", the boys are trying to get Kenny off the latest drug craze that's captured the junior high and under set.

title: Canada on Strike
description: The head of the World Canadian Bureau leads the country into a long and painful strike and the responsibility of brokering a settlement rests with the boys.

title: Eek, A Penis!
description: While Ms. Garrison is off trying to find a way to become the man he was always intended to be, Cartman is put in charge of the classroom.

title: Over Logging
description: One day the citizens of South Park wake up and find the internet is gone. When Randy hears there may still be some internet out in California, he packs up his family and heads west.

title: Super Fun Time
description: While the kids are on an educational field trip to a living museum, Cartman makes Butters sneak away from the class to go to the amusement center located next door.

title: The China Probrem
description: With the rest of the American people haunted by the memory of a recent tragic event, only Butters will stand with Cartman as he confronts the Chinese.

title: Breast Cancer Show Ever
description: Wendy gets in trouble when she threatens to beat up Cartman after school.

title: Pandemic
description: While the world struggles to contain an epidemic of epic proportions, the boys find a way to make money off of it.

title: Pandemic 2: The Startling
description: Giant guinea pigs are attacking cities all over the world. The boys have the key that will save everyone from the onslaught but they're stranded in the Andes Mountains.

title: About Last Night...
description: While the country celebrates the outcome of the election, the new President-elect catches everyone off guard when he arrives at the White House prematurely.

title: Elementary School Musical
description: The boys must embrace the latest fad to hit South Park Elementary or risk their status as the coolest kids in school.

title: The Ungroundable
description: Butters is sure he's seen a vampire at school but he can't get anyone to listen to him. Meanwhile, the Goth Kids are angry and frustrated when the other kids can't tell the difference between a Goth and a Vampire.

title: The Ring
description: Kenny takes his new girlfriend to a Jonas Brothers' concert where they each get purity rings.

title: The Coon
description: "The Coon" rises from the trash and takes his place as a lone vigilante who wipes out crime in the town of South Park.

title: Margaritaville
description: Randy steps forward with a solution to fix the desperate state of the economy.

title: Eat, Pray, Queef
description: Someone plays an April Fool's joke on the boys and it doesn't go over well.

title: Fishsticks
description: Cartman and Jimmy come up with the funniest joke of all time.

title: Pinewood Derby
description: Randy has a plan that will assure Stan a first place trophy in this year's Pinewood Derby.

title: Fatbeard
description: Cartman's dream of living the life of a pirate will come true if he can just get to Somalia.

title: Dead Celebrities
description: Ike is being tormented by paranormal forces. Kyle brings in professional ghost hunters to help save his little brother.

title: Butters' Bottom Bitch
description: Butters is determined to get his first kiss so his friends won't make fun of him anymore.

title: W.T.F.
description: After attending their first WWE match, all the boys want to be professional wrestlers.

title: Whale Whores
description: Stan takes action to stop the Japanese from killing the world's whales and dolphins.

title: The F Word
description: The boys fight back against the loud and obnoxious Motorcycle Riders that are disrupting everyone in South Park.

title: Dances With Smurfs
description: Cartman is chosen to do the morning announcements at South Park Elementary.

title: Pee
description: The boys' fun-filled day at the water park is about to turn deadly.

title: Sexual Healing
description: The latest in scientific testing reveals that some of the boys at South Park Elementary have a sex addiction problem.

title: The Tale of Scrotie McBoogerballs
description: The boys are given a controversial book to read in school and it inspires them to write one of their own.

title: Medicinal Fried Chicken
description: Cartman's favorite restaurant has been shut down and replaced by a store that sells medical marijuana. Randy is so desperate to get a prescription card to buy pot and Cartman will do anything to get his beloved fried chicken back.

title: You Have 0 Friends
description: When Kyle begs Stan to "friend" him, Stan gets sucked into Facebook.
The town of South Park faces a class action lawsuit as every celebrity they've ever ridiculed is out for revenge.
Angry celebrities, violent ginger kids, and Mecha Streisand are about to destroy South Park and all anyone wants to know is, "Who is Eric Cartman's father?"

title: Crippled Summer
description: Timmy and Jimmy head off to summer camp with their handicapable friends.

title: Poor and Stupid
description: Cartman dreams of being a NASCAR driver and he's willing to do whatever it takes to make it happen.

title: It's A Jersey Thing
description: New Jersey is rapidly taking over the nation one state at a time and their next stop is South Park.

title: Insheeption
description: When Stan is sent to the school counselor because he's holding on to an obscene number of useless possessions, he realizes that Mr. Mackey has a hoarding disorder too.

title: Coon 2: Hindsight
description: "Coon and Friends" set out to help the victims of BP's latest catastrophic drilling accident in the Gulf. Much to the Coon's dismay, another Super Hero gets there first.

title: Mysterion Rises
description: Mysterion's true identity is revealed. Meanwhile, the Coon, scorned by his fellow super heroes, is out for revenge.

title: Coon vs. Coon & Friends
description: Coon and Friends find themselves at the mercy of Cartman who now has the dark lord, Cthulhu, doing his bidding.?????? Kenny wrestles with the curse of his super power through his alter ego, Mysterion.

title: Creme Fraiche
description: Stan's life is a shambles both at home and in school. Randy's obsession with the Food Network Is changing everything. It even forces Sharon to explore a new interest of her own.

title: HUMANCENTiPAD
description: Kyle is intimately involved in the development of a revolutionary new product called HumancentiPad.

title: Funnybot
description: Jimmy hosts the Special Ed Department's First Annual Comedy Awards.

title: Royal Pudding
description: The Prince of Canada is about to take a Princess and Ike is obsessed with the Royal Wedding.

title: T.M.I.
description: Cartman throws a fit when the boy's penis sizes are posted on the school bulletin board, He is sent to anger management therapy.

title: Crack Baby Athletic Association
description: Kyle gets in on the ground floor of Cartman's latest business venture, The Crack Baby Athletic Association.

title: City Sushi
description: Butters' parents take him to see a specialist.

title: You're Getting Old
description: Just after Stan's 10th birthday, his worldview starts to change and so do his friendships.

title: Ass Burgers
description: Cartman finds a unique way to cope with Asperger's Syndrome.

title: The Last of the Meheecans
description: Cartman joins the U.S. Border Patrol.

title: Bass to Mouth
description: The kid's most scandalous secrets are being leaked on an outrageous new gossip website.

title: Broadway Bro Down
description: After Randy takes Sharon to see a hit musical, he becomes Broadway's biggest fan.
The 99% is ganging up on Eric Cartman.

title: A History Channel Thanksgiving
description: The boys are getting close to discovering the truth about the first Thanksgiving.

title: The Poor Kid
description: Kenny ends up in the foster care system after his parents are arrested.

title: Reverse Cowgirl
description: When one of the boys leaves the toilet seat up after he uses the bathroom, an unspeakable tragedy occurs.

title: Cash For Gold
description: Cartman launches his own gem shopping channel.

title: Faith Hilling
description: The kids are in danger when new trends start to evolve and shift at a rapid pace.

title: Jewpacabra
description: The town's big Easter Egg Hunt is in jeopardy when Cartman produces video evidence of a mysterious creature lurking in the woods.

title: Butterballs
description: Butters is the victim of an unlikely bully.

title: I Should Have Never Gone Ziplining
description: The boys' ziplining adventure becomes a terrifying test of survival.

title: Cartman Finds Love
description: The time has finally come for Cartman to let a special someone know exactly how he feels.

title: Sarcastaball
description: South Park Elementary takes steps to address footballs concussion crisis.

title: Raising the Bar
description: Cartman finally admits hes fat and immediately gets a mobility scooter.

title: Insecurity
description: Cartman signs up for a home security system.

title: Going Native
description: It is time for Butters to begin a journey where he will follow in the path of his Hawaiian ancestors.

title: A Nightmare on Face Time
description: Randy's big plans for Halloween night keep Stan from trick or treating with his friends.

title: A Scause for Applause
description: A serious doping scandal shakes everyone's faith in a beloved icon. Everyone who once supported the fallen hero, is now cutting off their symbolic yellow wristbands.

title: Obama Wins!
description: Eric Cartman is hiding something in his bedroom that could change the entire outcome of the Presidential election.

title: Let Go, Let Gov
description: Cartman wants to hold the government accountable for secretly monitoring all of his personal information.

title: Informative Murder Porn
description: The boys use the game of MINECRAFT as a distraction to keep their parents from hurting each other.

title: World War Zimmerman
description: Cartman is deeply disturbed by a single person who he sees as a threat to all humanity. He races around the country to put an end to Patient Zero, the ticking time bomb that is Tolkien.

title: Goth Kids 3: Dawn of the Posers
description: The Goth kids are being sent away to a camp for troubled children.

title: Taming Strange
description: When Ike hits puberty, he and Kyle start to grow apart. To save their relationship, Kyle takes Ike to see a live performance of Yo Gabba Gabba.

title: Ginger Cow
description: Cartman's latest prank has brought about the necessary spiritual conditions for world peace. Religious leaders descend upon South Park to witness a Biblical prophecy that has been fulfilled. Cartman and Kyle are the only two at odds as the world embarks upon a thousand years of peace and harmony.

title: Black Friday
description: The boys prepare to battle the crowds already lining up for the first official day of holiday shopping.

title: A Song of Ass and Fire
description: Black Friday is almost here and the battle for the new gaming devices is heating up. Princess Kenny's betrayal has left Cartman out for revenge.

title: Titties and Dragons
description: The doors to the mall will finally open for the biggest Black Friday sale in history. The boys are divided over which gaming device to buy and a bloody battle will determine whether Xbox or Sony will be the winner.

title: The Hobbit
description: When Wendy tries to fix one of her girl friends up with Butters, she ends up in the counselor's office.

title: Go Fund Yourself
description: The boys start a company and seek funding for it on Kickstarter.

title: Gluten Free Ebola
description: South Park goes gluten free after they find out their dick will fly off if they don't.

title: The Cissy
description: Randy is harboring a giant secret and the pressure is getting to him. Meanwhile, Cartman calls Stan a sissy.

title: Handicar
description: Timmy's successful new car service makes him a lot of enemies.

title: The Magic Bush
description: Cartman and Butters get their hands on a drone and take it for a spin around the neighborhood

title: Freemium Isn't Free
description: Stan is addicted to the new Terrance and Phillip mobile game.

title: Grounded Vindaloop
description: Butters is convinced he's living in a virtual reality.

title: Cock Magic
description: There are illegal goings-on in the basement of City Wok.

title: #REHASH
description: Kyle just wants to play video games with his little brother. But, when Ike doesn't want to play with him anymore, Kyle is afraid that the next generation is passing him by.

title: #HappyHolograms
description: Cartmaan Bra is trending as the country prepares to watch the biggest Holiday Spectacular ever.

title: Stunning and Brave
description: South Park Elementary gets a new principal.

title: Where My Country Gone?
description: Mr. Garrison wants to build a wall to keep out all of the undocumented immigrants.

title: The City Part of Town
description: The town of South Park is gentrifying and Kenny thinks it's time to get a job.

title: You're Not Yelping
description: Cartman considers himself the top online restaurant reviewer in South Park.

title: Safe Space
description: Cartman is the latest victim of body shaming.

title: Tweek x Craig
description: The Asian girls in school are drawing dreamy pictures of Tweek and Craig.

title: Naughty Ninjas
description: The citizens of South Park decide they no longer need a police force in town.

title: Sponsored Content
description: Jimmy's integrity as a newsman runs smack into PC Principal's ideology.

title: Truth and Advertising
description: PC Principal disappears with two of the 4th grade students.

title: PC Principal Final Justice
description: Kyle has chosen a dangerous alliance over his friendship with Stan.

title: Member Berries
description: Mr. Garrison is still on the campaign trail as the National Anthem gets a reboot by an American Icon.

title: Skank Hunt
description: Kyle's dad manages to keep his identity as a troll a secret while he takes his on-line abuse global.

title: The Damned
description: Gerald is thrilled with the media attention as he continues to troll everyone and anyone.

title: Wieners Out
description: The boys band together to stand up for their rights.

title: Douche and a Danish
description: Giant Douche wants out of the Presidential race.

title: Fort Collins
description: An entire city in Colorado gets hacked. Gerald and Cartman may lose everything when their complete history of internet activity becomes public.

title: Oh, Jeez
description: PC Principal tries one more time to make peace between the boys and the girls. Meanwhile Gerald comes face-to-face with the Troll Hunter.

title: Members Only
description: The new President-elect pays a visit to his hometown. Gerald tries anything to escape the Troll Hunter's revenge. Meanwhile, Cartman and Heidi make their way to SpaceX to try to get on the first rocket leaving for Mars.

title: Not Funny
description: Cartman is certain that Butters is trying to steal his girlfriend.

title: The End of Serialization as We Know It
description: Cartman finally understands why Heidi wants to get to Mars.

title: White People Renovating Houses
description: Randy comes to grips with what it means to be white in today's society.

title: Put It Down
description: When Tweek is caught in the middle of a petty conflict, it drives his relationship with Craig to the brink.

title: Holiday Special
description: In a return to form, a forbidden love story between a white man and a Native American man unfolds.

title: Franchise Prequel
description: Facebook is the ultimate weapon for Professor Chaos.

title: Hummels & Heroin
description: Beloved entertainers are being cut down in their prime due to massive overdoses of opiates. Stan is about to be exposed as the source of the illegal drugs.

title: Sons A Witches
description: At the annual Halloween get together, a witch casts a spell that terrorizes everyone in South Park.

title: Doubling Down
description: Kyle is playing with fire when he gets in the middle of Cartman and Heidi's relationship.

title: Moss Piglets
description: Jimmy and Timmy's experiment could win them first prize in the annual science fair.

title: SUPER HARD PCness
description: It's never been more challenging to be a PC Principal.

title: Splatty Tomato
description: The children of South Park claim to have seen Mr. Garrison lurking around town. The townspeople are angry that the President is scaring their children.

title: Dead Kids
description: Sharon is overreacting to everything these days and Randy can't cope. Randy is desperate to help Sharon get her emotions under control and Cartman unexpectedly fails his math test.

title: A Boy and a Priest
description: A very special relationship has developed between Butters and the Parish Priest. When the town finds the church doors locked and no sign of the pair, they call in the Catholic Church.

title: The Problem With a Poo
description: Mr. Hankey must defend his character or lose everything that is important to him. Mr. Hankey's offensive behavior puts him in jeopardy of being fired as the Director of the Annual Christmas Pageant. Meanwhile, at South Park Elementary, Strong Woman and PC Principal face a whole new set of challenges in their relationship.

title: Tegridy Farms
description: The Vaping epidemic hits South Park Elementary. Butters is selling vape pens and all kinds of fruity-flavored vape accessories at school. Meanwhile, Randy decides he should move the family to the country and take up farming.

title: The Scoots
description: It's every boy and girl for themselves this year when the kids head out for tricks or treats. This year, a revolution in mobility is changing Halloween for everyone. Chaos erupts as every kid is out to get more candy than they have ever gotten before. Mr. Mackey and the rest of the adults ate hording emergency supplies and hoping to survive until morning.

title: Time To Get Cereal
description: The citizens of South Park have no idea the danger they're in. When dead citizens start popping up all over town, the boys realize they need Al Gore's help. The boys are willing to do almost anything to save the town, and themselves, but it may be just too late.

title: Nobody Got Cereal?
description: ManBearPig continues to terrorize South Park. The boys break out of jail and are on the run from the police and ManBearPig. Satan steps up to help the boys and the rest of the citizens of South Park.

title: Buddha Box
description: Eric Cartman has been diagnosed with anxiety. Cartman just can't deal with people any longer. They get in the way of what's most important in his life.

title: Unfulfilled
description: South Park is chosen to be the home for Amazon's newest Fulfillment Center. The citizens of South Park are enjoying all the perks of being a company town when the Amazon Fulfillment Center moves in. Everything is just swell until the contradictions inherent in capitalism threaten to bring down the entire system down.

title: Bike Parade
description: This week the Amazon workers are still on strike and now no one is getting their Christmas packages. Despite the chaos at the Amazon Fulfillment Center, the Bike Parade is still on. The boys' chance of winning is in jeopardy when Kenny resists commercialism in solidarity with the striking workers.

title: Mexican Joker
description: In the pilot episode of the new hit series, Tegridy Farms, Randy battles home-grown weed and comes to terms with the fact that he might be a towel. Meanwhile, Kyle goes to camp.

title: Band in China
description: Randy sees an opportunity for TEGRIDY in China. Randy lands himself in big trouble on a visit to China. Meanwhile, Stan starts a band to work out his frustration over having to move away from South Park.

title: Shots!!!
description: The show's creators celebrate the THIRD episode of Tegridy Farms. This week, Randy revels in a Tegridy Farms milestone. Meanwhile, Cartman stands his ground and refuses to get a shot.

title: Let Them Eat Goo
description: Cartman has a heart attack. The citizens of South Park are moving toward a completely plant-based diet. Cartman is pretty sure the new food in the cafeteria gave him a heart attack.

title: Tegridy Farms Halloween Special
description: It's Halloween and Randy is dealing with his daughter's marijuana problem. Butters gets an unexpected surprise when he visits the Egyptian Artifact exhibit at the Denver Museum.

title: Season Finale
description: The Mayor has evidence that Randy blew up his neighbor's yards in protest over homegrown weed and then blamed it on a Mexican Joker. Now the citizens of South Park have had enough of Randy and Tegridy Farms and they just want to lock him up.

title: Board Girls
description: The Annual Strong Woman Competition pushes everyone to their limits. An even stronger woman causes big problems for PC Principal. Cartman, Stan, and the rest of the boys meet their match when some of the girls join their board gamers club.

title: Turd Burglars
description: Kyle and Ike are desperate to keep a lid on their mom's medical condition. Kyle's mom looks so good after her fecal transplant that everyone wants to get their hands on her goods. Cartman and the boys jump into the quest for the best microbiome.

title: Basic Cable
description: Scott Malkinson's future with the new girl in his class depends on him getting the latest and greatest streaming platform. Scott's dad works for the local cable company and refuses to move beyond basic cable.

title: Christmas Snow
description: It's a bleak Christmas Season in South Park this year and it's all Santa's fault. He is single handedly stealing the joy from the holiday. The town just wants their Christmas Spirit back but that will take a Christmas miracle.

title: The Pandemic Special
description: Randy comes to terms with his role in the COVID-19 outbreak as the on-going pandemic presents continued challenges to the citizens of South Park. The kids happily head back to school but nothing resembles the normal that they once knew; not their teachers, not their homeroom, not even Eric Cartman.

title: South ParQ Vaccination Special
description: The citizens of South ParQ are clamoring for the COVID-19 vaccine. A hilarious new militant group tries to stop the boys from getting their teacher vaccinated.

title: Pajama Day
description: After failing to show respect for their teacher, PC Principal revokes Pajama Day privileges for the entire 4th grade class. Cartman is distraught. The kids aren't going to stand for it but PC Principal refuses to back down.

title: The Big Fix
description: Stan's horrified to realize he's misinterpreted some of the greatest writing of all time.

title: City People
description: Cartman is not happy when his mom gets a new job.

title: Back to the Cold War
description: A lot is riding on Butter's ability to crush the competition in the all-important dressage championship.

title: Help, My Teenager Hates Me!
description: The boys find out that the joys of playing Airsoft come with the challenges of dealing with teenagers.

title: Credigree Weed St. Patrick's Day Special
description: Butters is shocked to learn that people in South Park don't understand what St. Patrick's Day is really about.

title: Cupid Ye
description: Cartman is jealous of the friendship that's developed between Kyle and Tolkien and decides to do something about it.

title: The Worldwide Privacy Tour
description: The Prince of Canada and his wife try to find privacy and seclusion in a small mountain town.

title: Japanese Toilet
description: South Park learns about the wonders of Japanese toilets.

title: Deep Learning
description: Stan is reeling when a cheating scandal hits the school.

title: DikinBaus Hot Dogs
description: The South Park boys renovate and open an historic restaurant in Colorado.

title: Spring Break
description: Spring Break is an excuse for Garrison to jump back into his former depraved lifestyle.

title: SOUTH PARK: POST COVID
description: In SOUTH PARK: POST COVID, we'll find out the answer to the question: what happened to the children who lived through the pandemic? Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny survived, but will never be the same post COVID.

title: SOUTH PARK: POST COVID: THE RETURN OF COVID
description: What happened to the children who lived through the Pandemic? Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny survived but will never be the same Post Covid.

title: SOUTH PARK THE STREAMING WARS
description: In SOUTH PARK THE STREAMING WARS, Cartman locks horns with his mom in a battle of wills while an epic conflict unfolds that threatens South Park's very existence.

title: SOUTH PARK THE STREAMING WARS PART 2
description: In SOUTH PARK THE STREAMING WARS PART 2, a drought has brought the town of South Park to the brink of disaster.

title: SOUTH PARK: JOINING THE PANDERVERSE
description: In SOUTH PARK: JOINING THE PANDERVERSE, Cartman's deeply disturbing dreams portend the end of the life he knows and loves. The adults in South Park are also wrestling with their own life decisions as the advent of AI is turning their world upside down.
